overview: The things that dreams are made of. That is what this film is all about. American Porn Star twink Ashton Michael has been watching Alexander Pictures films and he’s imagined himself in them. With the help of some warm up sex to let you know just what he’s been thinking, you’ll walk in on the end of his journey as his friend Angel helps him out and gives him the ass pounding he’s been hoping for. Enjoy the ride!
title: Ashton Michaels' Porn Dream
